name: Hey ca!
author: r2magnum
notes:
I was inspired by the person above me (Wames). I was using a build that had 2 dakini, 0 saffira, 3 trunade. It was good enough to get me to legend 3 but couldn't win 5 in a row with it. So i switched to a saffira build and easy 5 wins.(edited)
i used hazy beatdown for a while, but lost kog promo with it twice, then decided to invest in trunade to play ca, and it payed off
